Hero.subtitle: We simplify global logistics with efficient, secure, and punctual solutions. Because your peace of mind is our priority.

RecommendedStores.title: Shop in the US, receive in your country
RecommendedStores.description: Find the best products in the most popular US stores. Shop online, use your GaspMakerCargo locker address at checkout, and we'll take care of delivering it right to your door.

Destinations.title_part2: Shipping to Trinidad and the Caribbean.
Destinations.description: Our specialized distribution network ensures your goods reach their destination in record time with guaranteed security.

About.title: Our Story of Commitment
About.subtitle: At GaspMakerCargo, our mission goes beyond moving goods...
About.missionText: Provide efficient and secure logistics solutions that connect the world to your door.
About.visionText: To be the number one logistics ally in the Caribbean and Latin America for our punctuality and transparency.

HowItWorks.title: Logistics in Simple Steps
HowItWorks.subtitle: Our process is designed to give you absolute control and maximum speed.
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Create your account and get your personalized Miami address (Locker) instantly.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Use your GaspMakerCargo address as the 'Shipping Address' at your favorite stores.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Upload your invoice in the client dashboard to speed up the customs process.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: We process your package, weigh it, and ship it to your country in record time.
HowItWorks.step5Desc: Combine multiple packages to save on costs. We store them for free for 30 days.
HowItWorks.step6Desc: We ship to your door with full tracking and security.
HowItWorks.benefit1Desc: Follow your packages from arrival in Miami to your door.
HowItWorks.benefit2Desc: Pay for what you bring. Use our calculator to estimate costs.
HowItWorks.benefit3Desc: Questions? Our team helps you at every step of your import.
HowItWorks.ctaFinalText: Joining is totally free. Get your locker and Miami address today.

Referral.title: Referral Program
Referral.subtitle: Invite friends and earn free shipping.
Referral.heroText: Did you know you can earn US$25 in shipping credits simply by sharing Gasp Maker Cargo with friends? Even better, your friend gets $25 off their first shipment!
Referral.minOrderBadge: VALID ON FIRST SHIPMENT OVER $100 USD
Referral.step1Text: Share your unique referral link via social media, email, or directly.
Referral.step3Text: You get $25 credit. They get $25 credit. It‚Äôs a win-win!
Referral.term1: Every time someone uses your referral link to sign up for a Gasp Maker Cargo account, you‚Äôll receive a $25 credit when they make their first shipment (minimum $100 order value).
Referral.term2: You‚Äôll only receive a credit when someone uses your special referral link. If they just sign up at gaspmakercargo.com directly, we can‚Äôt pay you for that referral. No exceptions can be made.
Referral.term3: You can‚Äôt refer yourself, or sign up for additional accounts, using your own referral link.
Referral.term4: You won‚Äôt get paid for referring an existing or past Gasp Maker Cargo customer.
Referral.term5: This program can‚Äôt be combined with other offers.
Referral.term6: We may suspend or cancel someone‚Äôs participation in the referral program if we notice fraudulent or abusive behavior.
Referral.term7: We reserve the right to discontinue the referral program at any time. (But we‚Äôll honor any outstanding payments if that happens.)
Referral.term8: Got any questions about what‚Äôs OK? Just ask our support team via chat.
Referral.faq1Q: When do I get my credit?
Referral.faq1A: Credits are applied to your account automatically once your friend completes their first payment.
Referral.faq2A: No! You can refer as many friends as you want.
Referral.faq3Q: Can I use credits for anything?
Referral.faq3A: Credits apply to shipping costs (freight). They do not cover customs duties or taxes.

FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your shipments.
FAQPage.q1: What items are prohibited from shipping?
FAQPage.a1: Based on IATA regulations, you cannot ship flammable materials, loose lithium batteries, perfumes (except by sea), weapons, drugs, or perishables.
FAQPage.q2: What are the current regulations for shipping to Cuba?
FAQPage.a2: Shipments to Cuba are subject to General Customs regulations. Non-commercial import of miscellaneous items is allowed under the points system.
FAQPage.a3: Yes, we offer basic insurance. For high-value items, we recommend additional insurance of 3% of the declared value.
FAQPage.a4: Airlines calculate cost based on space occupied. Formula is (Length x Width x Height) / 139. Chargeable weight is the higher of actual vs volumetric.
FAQPage.q5: Can I ship from Canada or use USPS?
FAQPage.a5: Yes, we work with Canada Post and USPS. Note that USPS is slower, while Canada Post offers excellent Priority services.
FAQPage.a6: Generally, duties are the recipient's responsibility unless DDP service is chosen. Each country has its own exemption limits.
FAQPage.footerbox_title: Can't find what you're looking for?
FAQPage.footerbox_text: Regulations change frequently. If you have specific questions, contact us.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our logistics and shipping services.
TermsOfService.s1_text: By accessing and using the services provided by GaspMakerCargo (GMC) ("we," "us," or "our"), including our website, warehouse facilities, and shipping services, you ("the User" or "Customer") agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
TermsOfService.s2_intro: GaspMakerCargo provides logistics solutions, including but not limited to:
TermsOfService.s2_li1: Receipt and processing of packages at our Miami warehouse.
TermsOfService.s2_li3: International air and ocean freight forwarding.
TermsOfService.s2_disclaimer: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time, particularly if the goods involve prohibited items or illegal activities.
TermsOfService.s3_intro: Effective management of warehouse space is critical to our operations. Our storage policy is as follows:
TermsOfService.s3_free_text: Customers are granted 30 days of free storage starting from the date the package arrives at our Miami facility.
TermsOfService.s3_fee_text: After the 30-day free period, a storage fee will be applied based on the volume (CFT) of the package. Currently calculated at a rate of $2.25 per CFT per month (or fraction thereof).
TermsOfService.s3_abandon_text: Packages stored for more than 90 days without payment or shipping instructions will be considered abandoned. GMC reserves the right to dispose of, auction, or destroy abandoned cargo to recover costs.
TermsOfService.s4_intro: All shipping charges, duties, and taxes must be paid before the final delivery or release of the cargo.
TermsOfService.s4_curr_text: All fees are billed in US Dollars (USD).
TermsOfService.s4_vol_text: Shipping costs are calculated based on the greater of actual weight or volumetric weight, in accordance with airline/carrier standards.
TermsOfService.s4_ref_text: Services rendered (such as shipping or consolidation already performed) are non-refundable. Claims for lost or damaged cargo must be filed within 7 days of receipt.
TermsOfService.s5_intro: The Customer is solely responsible for ensuring their cargo complies with all applicable export/import laws. We strictly do NOT ship:
TermsOfService.s5_warning: Attempting to ship prohibited items may result in the forfeiture of goods and reporting to relevant authorities (TSA, CBP).
TermsOfService.s6_intro: GaspMakerCargo acts as a freight forwarder and logistics agent. We are not liable for:
TermsOfService.s6_li1: Delays caused by customs (Aduana), airlines, or "Force Majeure" events (weather, strikes, pandemics).
TermsOfService.s6_li2: Damage to improperly packaged goods (if packed by the merchant/sender).
TermsOfService.s6_li3: Indirect or consequential damages (loss of profit, income, or business opportunity).
TermsOfService.s6_limit: Our liability is limited to the declared value of the goods or the limits set by international transport treaties (Montreal/Warsaw Conventions), whichever is lower, unless additional insurance is purchased.
TermsOfService.s7_intro: If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact our support team:

CookieBanner.title: We use Cookies üç™
CookieBanner.text: We use essential cookies to manage your session, remember your language, and ensure shipping security.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy.
PrivacyPolicy.intro_text: This Privacy Policy explains how GaspMakerCargo LLC ("we", "us", "our") collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you visit our website or use our logistics services. By using our services, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_text: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_li1_text: Names, phone numbers, email addresses, mailing addresses, billing addresses.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_li2_text: We may collect data necessary to process your payment if you make purchases (credit card numbers), managed securely via Stripe.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_li3_text: Information about your shipments, tracking numbers, package contents, and declared values.
PrivacyPolicy.s2_text: We use personal information collected via our website for a variety of business purposes described below:
PrivacyPolicy.s2_li1: To facilitate account creation and logon process.
PrivacyPolicy.s2_li2: To fulfill and manage your orders, payments, and returns.
PrivacyPolicy.s2_li3: To send administrative information to you (tracking updates, invoices).
PrivacyPolicy.s2_li4: To protect our Services (fraud monitoring and prevention).
PrivacyPolicy.s3_text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies (like web beacons and pixels) to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Notice.
PrivacyPolicy.s3_essential_text: Required for the website to function (e.g., login session, language preference).
PrivacyPolicy.s4_text: We only share information with the following third parties to perform specific services:
PrivacyPolicy.s4_li2_text: Airlines, sea freight carriers, and local delivery services (Tookan) strictly for delivery fulfillment.
PrivacyPolicy.s4_li3_text: Vercel and Supabase (for hosting and database security).
PrivacyPolicy.s5_text: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may email us at:

AffiliateDisclaimer.title: Affiliate Disclosure
AffiliateDisclaimer.text: This website contains affiliate links. This means that if you click on links to stores such as eBay, Shein, Walmart, Temu, AliExpress, or other mentioned platforms, and make a purchase, we may receive a small commission at no extra cost to you. These commissions help us keep the site running.
AffiliateDisclaimer.amazon: * As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases.
